Class ec.ifc.stonelook.SLScrollGroup 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.View
           |
           +----netscape.application.ScrollGroup
                   |
                   +----ec.ifc.stonelook.SLScrollGroup
public class SLScrollGroup
extends ScrollGroup
implements HasColorScheme
Subclass of ScrollGroup that applies the stone-texture look.

SLScrollGroup()
Returns a new scroll group with the stone-texture look and empty bounds.
SLScrollGroup(int, int, int, int)
Returns a new scroll group with the stone-texture look and the specified bounds.

createScrollBar(boolean)
overridden to create an SLScrollBar
createScrollView()
overridden to create an SLScrollView
getBackgroundImage()
Returns the background image of the associated ScrollView.
getColorScheme()
Returns the color scheme used for the scroll group's scroll bars -- one of the set of schemes specified by class StoneLook.
setBackgroundImage(Image)
Sets the background image of the associated ScrollView.
setColorScheme(int)
Sets the color scheme for this scroll group's scroll bars.

SLScrollGroup 
  public SLScrollGroup()
Returns a new scroll group with the stone-texture look and empty bounds.
SLScrollGroup 
  public SLScrollGroup(int x,
                       int y,
                       int width,
                       int height)
Returns a new scroll group with the stone-texture look and the specified bounds.

createScrollBar 
  protected ScrollBar createScrollBar(boolean horizontal)
overridden to create an SLScrollBar

createScrollBar in class ScrollGroup
createScrollView 
  protected ScrollView createScrollView()
overridden to create an SLScrollView
Overrides:
createScrollView in class ScrollGroup
getBackgroundImage 
  public Image getBackgroundImage()
Returns the background image of the associated ScrollView.
getColorScheme 
  public int getColorScheme()
Returns the color scheme used for the scroll group's scroll bars -- one of the set of schemes specified by class StoneLook. The default is StoneLook.BLUES.
setBackgroundImage 
  public void setBackgroundImage(Image newImage)
Sets the background image of the associated ScrollView.
